events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving significant front-end damage.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision with another car.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to assist the customer with the accident claim and provide necessary support.
The claim has been acknowledged officially, and the customer was provided with initial information on next steps.
Requested official police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates for claim processing.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident report, photos, and repair shop invoices.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and vehicle inspection reports to assess claim validity.
The investigation concluded with confirmation of the events as described by the customer and no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer covering the full estimated repair costs and rental car reimbursement.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the claims process so far.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company after the customer accepted the settlement offer.
Insurance payment was disbursed to the repair facility and customerâ€™s rental car expenses were reimbursed promptly.
The claim file was closed successfully after full payment and final confirmation from the customer on repair completion.
